actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to require reporting by certain employee associations.

summary.text: Broadens the requirement under the Labor Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 which directs every person who, pursuant to an agreement with an employer, either: (1) undertakes persuasive activities relating to the right to organize and bargain collectively; or, (2) supplies information on activities in connection with a labor dispute to report to the Secretary of Labor, to include all persons who receive any assistance from an employer to perform any function under (1) or (2).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to require reporting by certain employee associations.
